Description:
Central Point - New with so many upgrades. Amazing value
Your future success depends on timely investments and you can't beat a beautifully packaged property, well located in this high growth area!
Situated near Crib Point Village shops, bus and train stations and walking distance to schools and recreational areas do not miss out.
Choose from 1, 2 and 3 bedroom designs, a quality fit-out and a modern "sandstone look" façade with only four (4) on the block.
Smart designs feature internal doors to your garage, gas ducted heating, square set cornice, dual access bathrooms and energy efficient layouts. Kitchens have laminated bench-tops and stainless steel appliances. Fully fitted inside and out, these great properties will be ready to rent out or move in to on handover day!
You can purchase off the plan now on a low 5% deposit with no more to pay til completion in about three (3) months time. Save on stamp duty (depending on when you purchase) and, if you qualify, you may get the full $10,000 first home boost!!
Now is the time to jump into the rental market with low vacancy rates and values on the rise. Call today for your information pack.....

Description:
First One In
In a tranquil setting, this 2 bedroom unit with 2 living areas is only 1 year old. Both bedrooms are of good size with B.I.R.s which have views of the large fenced front garden, landscaped with natives. The open plan kitchen, has a stainless steel u/b oven and gas cook top, with plenty of cupboard space plus a dishwasher. The living area looks through the sliding doors out to the deck ,ideal for outdoor entertainment, with a single lockable brick garage which has rear access. With neutral tones throughout this unit would suit someone downsizing but still have a garden where you could grow your own or enjoy the peaceful surrounds. Investors take note of a secure 12 month lease and great rental return of $14,820 pa (plus deprecation benefits) with these as new units which are across the road from the sporting reserve and swimming pool.

Description:
Your Dream Family Home
This 4 bedroom home on a 996m2 (approx) block was built with families in mind and includes all the extras.
The moment you step inside you can see the thought that has gone into making this home practical and tasteful. This is open plan living at its best with a spacious lounge and adjoining family room. 9ft ceilings throughout add to the sense of space and the modern kitchen includes dishwasher, walk in pantry and is complimented by a large, tiled dining area.
There are four generous bedrooms each with BIRs, the master suite features his and hers walk in robes and full ensuite. Additional benefits inside include plenty of storage, an oversized laundry plus gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling.
Externally this great property will not disappoint. An asphalt drive runs the full length of the block and provides rear access to the huge (6 x 9m2 approx) garage/workshop. A covered deck is ideal for alfresco dining and the backyard is your blank canvas; ready to be landscaped into something spectacular of left open for the kids to enjoy.

Description:
Build Your Dream Home
A building block of land at 589m2 with all services plus your own driveway. House and land packages are available, through several builders or build with your own designs. First home buyers take advantage, of stamp duty savings as these blocks are the best value for your money and are within walking distance to local schools, sports reserve, swimming pool and transport. Titles have been released so the waiting is over, make your choice now because prices as low as these will not exist in the near future.

Description:
Perfect Entry Level Home or Investment on 996m2 approx
This modest home located on a fantastic block of 996m2 (approx) in a general residential zone 1 area will suit the first home buyer, investor or anyone looking for a foothold in the Crib Point property market.
The home itself is well presented and features:
- 3 bedrooms with new carpet and built in robes
- Bathroom plus separate toilet and laundry
- Gas heater in the lounge room
- Kitchen with gas upright cooker
Outside there is a single carport, rear covered pergola and garden shed.
Auction onsite Saturday 27th June at 1pm
